trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows control to display a list of items.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个 Windows 控件来显示的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: The ListBox control enables you to display a list of items to the user that the user can select by clicking.
trans-unit.target: ListBox 控件，可向用户可以通过单击选择的用户显示的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: A ListBox control can provide single or multiple selections using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ListBox 控件可以提供一个或多个选择使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ListBox also provides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MultiColumn%2A> property to enable the display of items in columns instead of a straight vertical list of items.
trans-unit.target: 列表框还提供了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MultiColumn%2A>属性以支持的项的项而不是直接垂直列表的列中显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MultiColumn%2A>

trans-unit.source: With this, the control can display more visible items and the user no longer needs to scroll to an item.
trans-unit.target: 与此操作，该控件可以显示更多可见项和用户不再需要滚动到某项。

trans-unit.source: Typically, Windows handles the task of drawing the items to display in the ListBox.
trans-unit.target: 通常，Windows 会处理绘制要在列表框中显示的项的任务。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property, and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> events so you can override the automatic drawing that Windows provides and draw the items yourself.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>属性，并处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件以便您可以重写绘制 Windows 自动提供和自己绘制项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use owner-drawn ListBox controls to display variable-height items, images, or a different color or font for the text of each item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 所有者描述的列表框控件可用于在列表中显示高度可变的项、 图像或不同的颜色或每个项的文本的字体。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A> property, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemRectangle%2A> also help you draw your own items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A>属性， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemRectangle%2A>还有助于在绘制自己的项目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition to display and selection functionality, the ListBox also provides features that enable you to efficiently add items to the ListBox and to find text within the items of the list.
trans-unit.target: 显示和选择功能，除了列表框还提供功能，允许你以有效地将项添加到列表框并查找的项列表中的文本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A> methods enable you to add a large number of items to the ListBox without the control being repainted each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法使你能够将大量的项添加到列表框中，而项添加到列表每次都重新绘制控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> methods enable you to search for an item in the list that contains a specific search string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法使你能够搜索包含特定的搜索字符串的列表中的项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> properties provide access to the three collections that are used by the ListBox.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>属性提供对由列表框的三个集合的访问。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table outlines the three collections used by the ListBox and their use within the control.
trans-unit.target: 下表概述了使用列表框并在控件内的其使用的三个集合。

trans-unit.source: |Collection class|Use within the ListBox| |----------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>|Contains all items contained in the ListBox control.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection>|Contains a collection of the selected items which is a subset of the items contained in the ListBox control.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>|Contains a collection of the selected indexes, which is a subset of the indexes of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>.
trans-unit.target: |集合类 |在列表框中的使用 | |----------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>|包含在列表框控件中包含的所有项。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection>|包含选定项的集合，这是包含在列表框控件中的项的子集。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>|包含一套所选的索引，这是索引的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>子集</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: These indexes specify items that are selected.| The following three examples show the three indexed collections that the ListBox class supports.
trans-unit.target: 这些索引指定选定项。 | 以下三个示例显示 ListBox 类支持的三个索引的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows an example of how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> stores the items of the ListBox as well as their selection state within an example ListBox.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示如何的示例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>存储的列表框，以及示例 ListBox 中的其所选内容状态的项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: |Index|Item|Selection state within the ListBox| |-----------|----------|----------------------------------------| |0|object1|Unselected| |1|object2|Selected| |2|object3|Unselected| |3|object4|Selected| |4|object5|Selected| Based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> shown in the previous table, this table shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection> would appear.
trans-unit.target: |索引 |项 |列表框中的选择状态 | |-----------|----------|----------------------------------------| |&0; | object1 |未选定 | |&1; | object2 |选择 | |&2; | object3 |未选定 | |&3; | object4 |选择 | |&4; | object5 |选择 | 基于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>上表中所示，此表显示如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection>将出现。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: |Index|Item| |-----------|----------| |0|object2| |1|object4| |2|object5| Based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> shown in the previous table, this table shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection> would appear.
trans-unit.target: |索引 |项 | |-----------|----------| |&0; | object2 | |&1; | object4 | |&2; | object5 | 基于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>上表中所示，此表显示如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>将出现。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: |Index|Index of item| |-----------|-------------------| |0|1| |1|3| |2|4| The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class enables you to add items to the ListBox.
trans-unit.target: |索引 |项的索引 | |-----------|-------------------| |&0; |&1; | |&1; |&3; | |&2; |&4; | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>类使你能够将项目添加到列表框。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method can accept any object when adding a member to the ListBox.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法可以接受任何对象，将成员添加到列表框时。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: When an object is being added to the ListBox, the control uses the text defined in the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method of the object unless a member name within the object is specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当一个对象将被添加到列表框中时，该控件使用中定义的文本<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>对象方法除非内对象的成员名中指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition to adding items using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class you can also add items using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 除了使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>你还可以添加项使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>类</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>的属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>的类</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>的方法</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>添加项目

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you have a ListBox, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> on a base Windows form and want to modify the string collections of those controls in a derived Windows form, the string collections of those controls in the base Windows form must be empty.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 必须列表框中，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>必须在基的 Windows 窗体和想要修改这些控件派生的 Windows 窗体中的字符串集合，这些基本的 Windows 窗体中的控件的字符串集合为空。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: If the string collections are not empty, they become read-only when you derive another Windows form.
trans-unit.target: 如果不为空字符串集合，这些变为只读派生另一个 Windows 窗体时。

trans-unit.source: Maintains performance while items are added to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> one at a time by preventing the control from drawing until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate*> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 项被添加到时维持性能<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>通过防止之前描述控件一次一个地<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate*>调用方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add multiple items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class (through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>).
trans-unit.target: 添加到多个项的首选的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>类 (通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以向单个操作中的列表添加项的数组。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class, you can use the BeginUpdate method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你想要添加项时使用一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>类，你可以使用 BeginUpdate 方法以防止重新绘制控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>每次向列表添加项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A> method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: 完成向列表添加项的任务后，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法，以使<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>来重绘。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> when a large number of items are being added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法添加项可以防止闪烁的绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>大量的项添加到列表时。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.target: 取消选择中的所有项<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于快速取消选择列表中的所有项。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of columns in a multicolumn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置列的宽度以多列<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value to zero (0), a default width is assigned to each column.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将值设置为零 (0) 时，默认宽度将分配给每个列。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is a multicolumn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, this property returns the current width of each column in the list.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>是多列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，此属性返回列表中的每个列的当前宽度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to ensure that each column in a multicolumn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> can properly display its items.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性以确保，在多列中的每个列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>可以对各个项进行正确显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of each column in the control.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位，在控件中每个列的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: A value less than zero is assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: 小于零的值被分配给属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the item collection.
trans-unit.target: 创建项集合的新实例。

trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>表示新的项集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class (through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>).
trans-unit.target: 将项添加到的首选的方式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>类 (通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以一次向列表添加项的数组。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你想要添加项时使用一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>类，可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A>方法，以防止重新绘制控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>每次向列表添加项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the EndUpdate method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: 完成向列表添加项的任务后，请调用 EndUpdate 方法，以启用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>来重绘。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> when a large number of items are being added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法添加项可以防止闪烁的绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>大量的项添加到列表时。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property when you are using an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to determine the size of any item within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性，当你使用所有者描述<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>来确定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>内的任何项的大小</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to return the height for.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the specified item.

trans-unit.target: 返回中的项的边框<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the item specified in the `index` parameter is not visible, the rectangle returned by this method will be outside the visible portion of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果中指定的项`index`参数不可见，此方法返回的矩形将位于控件的可见部分之外。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine the size and position of an item within the list.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于确定的大小和位置列表中的项。

trans-unit.source: To get the height of an item, especially a variable-height owner drawn list item, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的项的高度，尤其是一个高度可变的所有者描述的列表项，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of item whose bounding rectangle you want to return.
trans-unit.target: 你想要返回其边界矩形项的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: The index parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the value of the property of the class.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the bounds within which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> is scaled.
trans-unit.target: 检索其中的边界<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>缩放。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>类重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetScaledBounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，以确保请求的高度比例进行调整而不是当前的高度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetScaledBounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area for which to retrieve the display bounds.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>指定为其检索在显示器边界的区域。

trans-unit.source: The height and width of the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: 高度和宽度的控件的边界。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: 值之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> ，指定要定义其大小和位置时使用的控件边界。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified item is selected.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to quickly determine whether a specified item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此方法来快速确定指定的项是否处于选定状态。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when a specific operation needs to be performed when a specific item in a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is selected.
trans-unit.target: 当需要时多选中特定项执行特定操作时，此方法很有用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>选择。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的项中当前选定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The index parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the value of the property of the class.
trans-unit.target: index 参数小于零或大于或等于的类的属性的值

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width by which the horizontal scroll bar of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> can scroll.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置所依据的宽度的水平滚动条<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>可以滚动。

trans-unit.source: This property only reports a useful value if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性只报告有用的值，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is smaller than the value of this property, the horizontal scroll bar horizontally scrolls items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>小于此属性，则水平滚动条中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>水平滚动项的值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>的宽度

trans-unit.source: If the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is equal to or greater than this value, the horizontal scroll bar is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 如果宽度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>等于或大于此值，将会隐藏水平滚动条。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is not dynamically updated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值不会受支持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>动态更新

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when the items of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> are owner-drawn.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性很有用的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>是所有者描述。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the owner drawn items of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> are 200 pixels wide, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is 60 pixels wide, the HorizontalExtent property would need to be set to 200 in order to scroll the right edge of the items into the visible region of the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果所有者描述的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>是 200 像素宽，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>60 个像素宽，HorizontalExtent 属性需要滚动到控件的可见区域的项的右边缘，为了设置为 200。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, that the horizontal scroll bar can scroll the control.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位，水平滚动条可滚动控件的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The default is zero.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为零。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a horizontal scroll bar is displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件中显示水平滚动条。

trans-unit.source: The HorizontalScrollbar property determines whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> should display a horizontal scroll bar when the width of items within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> extend beyond the right edge of the control.
trans-unit.target: HorizontalScrollbar 属性确定是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>应显示水平滚动栏时中的项的宽度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>超出控件的右边缘。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the scroll bar is automatically displayed based on the width of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，则会基于中的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>宽度自动显示滚动条

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, in order to properly display a horizontal scroll bar, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>是一个所有者绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，以便正确地显示水平滚动条，必须设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display a horizontal scroll bar in the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要在控件; 中显示水平滚动条否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the zero-based index of the item at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定坐标处的项的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to determine which item is located at a specific location within the control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可确定哪一项位于控件内的特定位置。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which item within the list is selected when a user right-clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法来确定哪些项列表中的选择了当用户右键单击<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The location of the cursor can be determined and passed to the `p` parameter of the IndexFromPoint method to determine which item the user right-clicked the mouse over.
trans-unit.target: 可以确定光标的位置，并将其传递给`p`IndexFromPoint 方法来确定用户的哪一项参数通过右键单击鼠标。

trans-unit.source: You can then display a shortcut menu to the user to provide tasks and features based on the specific item.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以为用户提供任务和基于特定项的功能来显示快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> object containing the coordinates used to obtain the item index.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>对象，其中包含用于获取的项索引的坐标。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item found at the specified coordinates; returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""></xref> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的坐标; 找到的项的从零开始的索引返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""></xref>如果未找到匹配。

trans-unit.source: Returns the zero-based index of the item at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定坐标处的项的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to determine which item that is located at a specific location within the control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可确定哪一项位于控件内的特定位置。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which item within the list is selected when a user right-clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法来确定哪些项列表中的选择了当用户右键单击<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The location of the cursor can be determined and passed to the `x` and `y` parameters of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A> method to determine which item the user right-clicked the mouse over.
trans-unit.target: 可以确定光标的位置，并将其传递给`x`和`y`参数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A>方法来确定用户的哪一项之前通过右键单击鼠标。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then display a shortcut menu to the user to provide tasks and features based on the specific item.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以为用户提供任务和基于特定项的功能来显示快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the location to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的位置的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the location to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的位置 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item found at the specified coordinates; returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""></xref> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的坐标; 找到的项的从零开始的索引返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""></xref>如果未找到匹配。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should resize to avoid showing partial items.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否应调整大小以避免只显示部分项。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the control automatically resizes to ensure that an item is not partially displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，该控件自动调整大小以确保不部分显示项。

trans-unit.source: If you want to maintain the original size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> based on the space requirements of your form, set this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要维护的原始大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>基于窗体的空间要求，将此属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> sizes are such that they show only whole items.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>大小是这样的︰ 它们仅显示整个项目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you want the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> to completely fill a docked area, set IntegralHeight to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>若要完全填充的停靠的区域，设置 IntegralHeight 为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: This causes the control to completely fill the area, but the last item is not fully displayed.
trans-unit.target: 这将使控件以完全填充区域，但没有完全显示的最后一项。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> does not contain any items, this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>不包含任何项，此属性不起作用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The integral height is based on the height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, rather than the client area height.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 整体高度基于高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，而不是工作区的高度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: As a result, when the IntegralHeight property is set `true`, items can still be partially shown if scroll bars are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当 IntegralHeight 属性设置`true`，项仍可部分显示是否显示滚动条。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`, this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>属性设置为`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`，此属性不起作用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control resizes so that it does not display partial items; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件调整大小以便它不会显示部分项;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of an item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置中的项的高度<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed`, all items have the same height.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>属性设置为`DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed`，所有项都具有高度相同。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`, the ItemHeight property specifies the height of each item added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>属性设置为`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`，ItemHeight 属性指定的每个项添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>高度</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because each item in an owner-drawn list can have a different height, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A> method to get the height of a specific item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 由于为所有者描述的列表中每一项只能有一个不同的高度，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>方法以获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>中特定项的高度</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you use the ItemHeight property on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with items of variable height, this property returns the height of the first item in the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用的 ItemHeight 属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>可变高度的项，此属性将返回第一项高度控件中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The maximum height of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> item is 255 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 最大高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>项是 255 像素。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of an item in the control.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位，控件中项的高度。

trans-unit.source: The ItemHeight property was set to less than 0 or more than 255 pixels.
trans-unit.target: ItemHeight 属性已设置为小于 0 或超过 255 个像素。

trans-unit.source: Gets the items of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取的项<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to obtain a reference to the list of items that are currently stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使您能够获取对当前存储在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>的项列表的引用

trans-unit.source: With this reference, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 通过此引用，可以将项添加、 删除项，并获取集合中项的计数。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the tasks that can be performed with the item collection, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class reference topics.
trans-unit.target: 有关可以与项集合执行的任务的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>类参考主题。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: You can also manipulate the items of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以操作的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> property to add items to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you can view the items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> using the Items property but you cannot add or remove items from the list using the methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to determine the height that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> needs to be sized to, in order to display every available item in the list and to avoid displaying vertical scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使您能够确定窗体高度，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>需要进行大小调整到，为了在列表中显示可用的每个项并避免显示垂直滚动条。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If the amount of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is large, sizing the control using the value of the PreferredHeight property might cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to be sized outside of the client area of the form or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> container.
trans-unit.target: 如果中的项量<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>大，则使用的值的属性可能会导致 PreferredHeight 控件的大小调整<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>进行大小调整窗体在客户端区之外或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>容器。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The combined height, in pixels, of all items in the control.
trans-unit.target: 组合的高度，以像素为单位，在控件中的所有项。

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to invalidate its client area and immediately redraw itself and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: 强制控件使其工作区无效并立即重绘自己和任何子控件。

trans-unit.target: 刷新指定索引处的项。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether text displayed by the control is displayed from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示由控件显示的文本是否从右到左显示。

trans-unit.source: This property enables your menus to support languages that are written from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使你菜单以支持写入从右到左的语言。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, item text is displayed from right to left instead of the default left to right method.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，项文本显示从右到左而不是从左到右的方法的默认值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Scales a control's location, size, padding and margin.
trans-unit.target: 缩放控件的位置、 大小、 填充和边距。

trans-unit.source: The factor by which the height and width of the control will be scaled.
trans-unit.target: 高度和宽度的控件缩放依据因子。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> value that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref>值，该值指定要定义其大小和位置时使用的控件的边界。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the vertical scroll bar is shown at all times.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否所有时候都显示垂直滚动条。

trans-unit.source: The ScrollAlwaysVisible property indicates whether a vertical scroll bar is always displayed, even if the number of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> does not require displaying the vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: ScrollAlwaysVisible 属性指示是否始终显示垂直滚动条，即使<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>不需要显示垂直滚动栏</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>中的项的数目

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> only shows a vertical scroll bar when there are enough items to warrant displaying.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>在有足够一定要显示的项时，只显示垂直滚动条。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: For a multicolumn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, the ScrollAlwaysVisible property indicates that a horizontal scroll bar is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 对于多列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，ScrollAlwaysVisible 属性指示是否显示水平滚动条。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: A vertical scroll bar is never displayed regardless of the value of this property for a multicolumn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 垂直滚动条多列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>永远不会显示而不考虑此属性的值

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the vertical scroll bar should always be displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应始终显示垂直滚动条;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the zero-based index of the currently selected item in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置中的当前选定项的从零开始索引<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you can use this property to determine the index of the item that is selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 标准<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，则可以使用此属性来确定在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>的所选的项的索引</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is set to either `SelectionMode.MultiSimple` or `SelectionMode.MultiExtended` (which indicates a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>) and multiple items are selected in the list, this property can return the index to any selected item.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>设置为`SelectionMode.MultiSimple`或`SelectionMode.MultiExtended`(指示多选<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>) 并在列表中选择多个项目，此属性可以返回任意选定项的索引。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a collection containing the indexes of all selected items in a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索包含的所有索引的集合在多重选择中选择项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you want to obtain the item that is currently selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要获取中当前选定的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A> property to obtain all the selected items in a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>属性来获取多选<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>中所有选定的项目</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index of the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: 当前选定项的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: A value of negative one (-1) is returned if no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 为负一 (-1) 如果未不选定任何项则返回值。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the item count.
trans-unit.target: 所赋的值小于-1 或大于或等于项计数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode*>属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex*> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices*> collection has changed.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<> *1> 属性或<> *1> 集合已更改。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for this event to determine when the selected index in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> has been changed.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建此事件来确定一个事件处理程序中的所选的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>已更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: This can be useful when you need to display information in other controls based on the current selection in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 这一点可能很有用，当你需要在基于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>中的当前选择其他控件中显示信息

trans-unit.source: You can use the event handler for this event to load the information in the other controls.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此事件的事件处理程序以加载其他控件中的信息。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>, any change to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> collection, including removing an item from the selection, will raise this event.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>，对进行任何更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>集合，包括删除某个项从所选内容，将引发此事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains the zero-based indexes of all currently selected items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个集合包含中的所有当前选定项的从零开始索引<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, this property returns a collection containing the indexes to all items that are selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 多选<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，则此属性返回一个包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>中，选择的所有项的索引的集合</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: For a single-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, this property returns a collection containing a single element containing the index of the only selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 单项选择<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，则此属性返回一个包含单个元素包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>唯一选定的项的索引的集合</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to manipulate the items of the collection, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何操作的集合的项的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> class provides a number of ways to reference selected items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>类提供多种方式来引用所选的项目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the SelectedIndices property to obtain the index position of the currently selected item in a single-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用 SelectedIndices 属性以获取当前选定项的索引位置中单项选择<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you want to obtain the item that is currently selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, instead of the index position of the item, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要获取中当前选定的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，而不是项的索引位置，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A> property if you want to obtain all the selected items in a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>属性，如果你想要获取在多选<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>所有选定的项目</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection> containing the indexes of the currently selected items in the control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>包含控件中当前选定的项的索引。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.target: 如果当前不选定任何项，一个空<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>返回。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the currently selected item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前选定的项中<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you can use this property to determine which item is selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 标准<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，则可以使用此属性来确定在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>选择哪一项</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is set to either `SelectionMode.MultiSimple` or `SelectionMode.MultiExtended` (which indicates a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>) and multiple items are selected in the list, this property can return any selected item.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>设置为`SelectionMode.MultiSimple`或`SelectionMode.MultiExtended`(指示多选<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>) 并在列表中选择多个项，则此属性可以返回任意选定的项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a collection containing all selected items in a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索包含多个选定内容中的所有选定的项的集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you want to obtain the index position of the currently selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要获取在当前选定项的索引位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> property to obtain all the selected indexes in a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>属性来获取多选<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>中的所有所选的索引</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在中选择项的方法<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The SelectionMode property enables you to determine how many items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> a user can select at one time and how the user can make multiple-selections.
trans-unit.target: SelectionMode 属性使您能够确定在多少个项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>可以一次选择用户和用户如何建立多个选择。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: When the SelectionMode property is set to `SelectionMode.MultiExtended`, pressing SHIFT and clicking the mouse or pressing SHIFT and one of the arrow keys (UP ARROW, DOWN ARROW, LEFT ARROW, and RIGHT ARROW) extends the selection from the previously selected item to the current item.
trans-unit.target: 当 SelectionMode 属性设置为`SelectionMode.MultiExtended`、 按下 shift 键并单击鼠标或按 SHIFT 和箭头键 （向上箭头、 向下箭头、 向左键和向右箭头） 之一扩展到当前项选择范围从以前选择的项。

trans-unit.source: Pressing CTRL and clicking the mouse selects or deselects an item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 按住 ctrl 键并单击鼠标选择或取消选择列表中的项。

trans-unit.source: When the property is set to `SelectionMode.MultiSimple`, a mouse click or pressing the SPACEBAR selects or deselects an item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 当属性设置为`SelectionMode.MultiSimple`、 鼠标单击或按空格键选择或取消选择列表中的项。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_SelectionMode.One" name="SelectionMode.One" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 所赋的值不是之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 设置的指定的边界<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control increases and decreases by a multiple of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制增加和减少了的倍数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If height is a number that is not a multiple of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A>, the height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> will change by the largest multiple that is less than height.
trans-unit.target: 如果高度是一个数字，不是的倍数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A>的高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>将更改的最大倍数而小于高度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the parameters that correspond to the bounds not included in the specified parameter are passed in with their current values.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，随其当前值一起传递的参数对应于指定的参数中未包括的边界。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `height`, `width`, or the `x` or `y` properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property can be passed in with a reference to the current instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如， `height`， `width`，或`x`或`y`属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>属性可以随对控件的当前实例的引用传递。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, all values passed in are honored and applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: 但是，所有传入的值遵守并应用于控件。

trans-unit.source: The `specified` parameter represents the elements of the controls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A> changed by your application.
trans-unit.target: `specified`参数表示元素的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A>更改你的应用程序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the control, the `specified` parameter value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>的控件，`specified`参数值为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> is adjusted in response to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property being set, the `specified` parameter value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>在响应中调整<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>要设置属性`specified`参数值为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>的控件属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>

trans-unit.source: The specified index was outside the range of valid values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引已超出有效值的范围。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode*> property was set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode*>属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode*>

trans-unit.source: Sorts the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 对中的项进行排序<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sort forces the collection to add each item back to itself if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Sorted%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 排序强制要如果回发到自身添加每个项的集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Sorted%2A>属性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Sorted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each item is then inserted into the correct position.
trans-unit.target: 每个项会插入到正确的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> are sorted alphabetically.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否中的项<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>按字母顺序排序。

trans-unit.source: Use the Sorted property to automatically sort strings alphabetically in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Sorted 属性进行自动排序字符串按字母顺序在一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: As items are added to a sorted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, the items are moved to the appropriate location in the sorted list.
trans-unit.target: 将项目添加到一个经过排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，项目被移动到已排序的列表中的适当位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: When adding items to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items.
trans-unit.target: 当将项添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，它是第一次的项进行排序，然后添加新项更加高效。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with its Sorted set to `true` should not be bound to data using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>与设置为其 Sorted`true`不应绑定到数据使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: To display sorted data in a bound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you should bind to a data source that supports sorting and have the data source provide the sorting.
trans-unit.target: 显示排序中的数据绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，你应将绑定到支持排序的数据源并具有提供的排序的数据源。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if items in the control are sorted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件中的项进行排序;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or searches for the text of the currently selected item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或中的当前选定项的文本中搜索<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When the value of this property is set to a string value, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> searches for the item within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> that matches the specified text and selects the item.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性的值设置为一个字符串值，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>中项的搜索<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>的匹配指定的文本，并且选择的项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to determine which items are currently selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用此属性来确定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>中当前选定的项

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is set to `SelectionMode.MultiExtended`, this property returns the text of the first selected item.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>设置为`SelectionMode.MultiExtended`，此属性返回的第一个选定项的文本。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is not set to `SelectionMode.None`, this property returns the text of the first selected item.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>未设置为`SelectionMode.None`，此属性返回的第一个选定项的文本。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text of the currently selected item in the control.
trans-unit.target: 在控件中当前选定项的文本。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Text*> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Text*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Text*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the first visible item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置中的第一个可见项的索引<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the item with the index position zero (0) is at the top of the visible region of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 最初，用零 (0) 的索引位置的项是在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>的可见区域的顶部

trans-unit.source: If the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> have been scrolled, another item might be at the top of the control's display area.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>已经滚动，另一个项目可能会在控件的显示区域的顶部。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to obtain the index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> of the item that is currently positioned at the top of the visible region of the control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性获取中的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>在控件的可见区域的顶部当前所处的项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to position an item in the list at the top of the visible region of the control.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用此属性来定位控件的可见区域的顶部列表中的项。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first visible item in the control.
trans-unit.target: 在控件中的第一个可见项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串表示形式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A string that states the control type, the count of items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> control, and the Text property of the first item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>, if the count is not 0.
trans-unit.target: 描述控件的字符串类型中的项计数<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>控制和中的第一个项的文本属性<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>、 在计数不为 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> recognizes and expands tab characters when it draws its strings by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets*> integer array.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>识别并展开制表符，通过使用绘制其字符串时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets*>整数数组。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> recognizes and expands tab characters; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>识别并展开制表符字符数; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> can recognize and expand tab characters when drawing its strings.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>可以识别并展开制表符，在绘制其字符串时。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control can expand tab characters; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件可以展开的制表符字符数;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes the command message the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control receives from the top-level window.
trans-unit.target: 处理命令消息<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>控件接收到从顶级窗口。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> the top-level window sent to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>发送到的顶级窗口<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The list's window procedure.
trans-unit.target: 此列表的窗口过程。

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes can override this to add extra functionality, but should call the WndProc method on the base class to ensure that the list continues to function properly.
trans-unit.target: 继承的类可以覆盖此设置以添加额外的功能，但应在基类以确保列表继续正常调用 WndProc 方法。

trans-unit.source: A Windows Message Object.
trans-unit.target: Windows 消息对象。
